entry.title: Herbal hair oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grandmaas (GST Extra)
Type: Veg
Price: 139.00

Unlock the secret to lustrous, healthy hair with our premium Herbal Hair Oil, meticulously crafted using the finest natural ingredients. This potent blend combines the richness of cold-pressed oils and traditional herbs to deliver unparalleled nourishment and care to your hair and scalp.

Key Ingredients & Benefits:

  • Cold-Pressed Coconut Oil: Deeply moisturizes, conditions the scalp, and adds a natural shine to your hair.
  • Traditionally Made Castor Oil: Strengthens hair follicles, promotes hair growth, and reduces hair fall.
  • Sesame Oil: Rich in vitamins and minerals, it nourishes the scalp and prevents dryness.
  • Murraya Koenigii (Curry Leaves): Prevents premature greying and strengthens hair roots.
  • Eclipta Prostrata (Bhringraj): Known for its hair growth-promoting properties and reducing hair loss.
  • Phyllanthus Niruri: Helps in maintaining a healthy scalp and combats dandruff.
  • Hibiscus Rosa-Sinensis: Conditions the hair, adds volume, and combats hair loss.
  • Azadirachta Indica (Neem): Anti-fungal and anti-bacterial properties ensure a healthy, dandruff-free scalp.
  • Lawsonia Inermis (Henna): Natural conditioner and coloring agent that strengthens and protects hair.
  • Trigonella Foenum-Graecum (Fenugreek): Rich in proteins and nicotinic acid, it stimulates hair growth and prevents hair thinning.
  • Alternanthera Sessilis: Provides essential nutrients to the scalp, promoting overall hair health.
  • Chrysopogon Zizanioides (Vetiver): Soothes the scalp and adds a natural fragrance to the oil.


Why Choose Our Herbal Hair Oil?

Our Herbal Hair Oil is a powerhouse of nature’s finest ingredients, each chosen for its unique benefits. Free from harmful chemicals, it ensures your hair receives pure, natural care. Embrace the tradition of herbal hair care and experience the transformation.

The Ultimate Hair Care Solution

  • 100% Natural: No artificial preservatives, colors, or fragrances.
  • Traditionally Made: Leveraging age-old techniques for maximum efficacy.
  • Multipurpose: Suitable for all hair types and ages.

Give your hair the nourishment it deserves with our Herbal Hair Oil, and witness the magic of nature unfold with every drop.

Ingredients

Cold pressedcoconut oil,Traditionallymade castor oil,Sesame oil,Murraya koenigii,
Eclipta prostrata,Phyllanthusniruri, Hibiscus rosa sinensis,Azardirachta indica, Lawsonia
inermis,Trigonella foenumgraecum,alternanthera sessilis, Chrysopogon zizanioides

entry.title: Traditionally made castor oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grandmaas (GST Extra)
Type: Veg
Price: 139.00

Introducing our pure Traditionally Made Castor Oil! Handcrafted by boiling ponded native castor seeds in water, our castor oil is produced using traditional methods to ensure the highest quality and purity. Known for its nourishing and moisturizing properties, castor oil has been used for centuries to promote healthy hair, skin, and nails. Our natural and unrefined castor oil is free from additives and chemicals, making it the perfect choice for your beauty and wellness needs. Say hello to the time-tested benefits of castor oil with our lovingly crafted product. Order now and experience the purity of tradition for yourself!"

Ingredients

Traditionally made castor oil by Boiling ponded Native castor seeds in water

entry.title: Kuppaimeni Soap
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grandmaas (GST Extra)
Type: Natural
Price: 362.00

Kuppaimeni Soap (Copper leaf soap) - A real bath Soap


Kuppaimeni soap is crafted using the traditional Ayurvedic herb Kuppaimeni (Acalypha indica), known for its natural skincare benefits. This soap is a natural remedy for acne, blemishes, and skin irritation. Its antibacterial and anti-inflammatory properties make it ideal for daily use, helping to cleanse, soothe, and rejuvenate your skin. Free from harsh chemicals, this soap is perfect for those seeking a natural skincare solution. Suitable for all skin types, it leaves your skin feeling soft, fresh, and revitalized.

Kuppaimeni soap benefits 

1. Fights Acne and Pimples

2. Lightens Dark Spots and Pigmentation

3. Prevents Skin Infections

4. Reduces Unwanted Hair Growth

5. Soothes Skin Irritations

6. Detoxifies and Cleanses the Skin

7. Treats Wounds and Cuts

8. Moisturizes and Nourishes

9. Controls Excess Oil

 

Why choose Kuppaimeni Soap from Pettikadai.in

• Handmade
• Cold process
• 48 Days Curing
• No Animal Fat
• No chemical preservatives
• No Chemical Dyes or colors
• No chemical fragrances
(Natural Glycerin Intact)

Copper leaf soap Ingredients 
• Cold pressed coconut oil
• Traditionally made Castor oil
• Palm oil
• Copper leaf (kuppaimeni leaf) extract powder
• Lye derived from sea salt
• Natural Essential Oils
• Structured water 

Shelf Life : 2 years from mfg. date
Size : 100g
